posts.title: Water Train Wagon
posts.caption: It's a water train wagon. It carries water.

posts.title: Lumber Lifting Car
posts.caption: It's a lumber lifting car. Look, the waves! How does it work? The forks lift up small lumber pieces. What else? The car drives it, and it unconnects. And it snows? The wheels turn, except for the trailer's wheels. And that's all of it.
